subject: fix: prevent PWA update reload loop and use native notification prompt
body:
1. PWA Update reload loop fix (usePWAUpdate.ts):
   - Only reload on controllerchange if user explicitly clicked "Update Now"
   - Use sessionStorage flag to prevent re-triggering after reload
   - Skip showing update banner after successful update reload

2. Notification prompt fix (onesignal.ts):
   - Replace OneSignal.Slidedown.promptPush() with native Notification.requestPermission()
   - Shows clean browser prompt instead of generic "newsletters and updates" text
   - Still properly opts user into OneSignal after permission granted
